A foldable bicycle that can be easily stored in a small space, such as an apartment or a car trunk. This would be ideal for people who live in urban areas with limited space.
A bicycle that uses electric power to assist with pedaling, making it easier for people with disabilities or older adults to ride.
A bicycle that has a built-in GPS and mapping technology, allowing riders to easily navigate and track their routes.
A bicycle that has a modular design, allowing riders to customize and upgrade different parts of the bike to suit their individual needs and preferences.

A bicycle that has a unique and innovative design, such as a trike or a tadpole bike, that sets it apart from traditional bicycles and appeals to people who are looking for something new and exciting.
